data.meta_description: Get flexible pricing for the leading website translation and localization solution on the market. Invest in precise and seamless multilingual website translation from MotionPoint.
data.text:
Language Variety

Every translated language has a unique cost per word, and every website has a unique word count. To get a quote tell us the language(s) you need and the estimated word count your website has or will have. MotionPoint offers translation in any language. Trigger greater cost-efficiencies the more languages you add.

Translation Quality

Translation quality increases or decreases your translation costs. Be strategic, and calibrate your investment based on how sensitive each webpage is to translation quality. Ask MotionPoint for advice on what translation quality your industry tends to use in any given web page.
